entry.title: Bitcoind-in-background mode for SPV wallets
entry.summary: Tamas Blummer, a blockchain expert, suggests that instant machine to machine micro payments should be used to incentivize people to commit resources to the network. He proposes serving archive blocks to peers who pay for it. However, Wladimir highlights a potential drawback in which people may not know why or when to install this, hence suggesting to pack it with wallets.
